title: SWH or RTPV systems shall be mandatory in all types of buildings to be constructed on plot area of more than 4000 sq
clause_text: SWH or RTPV systems shall be mandatory in all types of buildings to be constructed on plot area of more than 4000 sq.m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
